extendedInfo.description: Invite the squirrel family to your home screen with this enchanting snowy forest scene. Snow falls gracefully over the squirrel home and in the distant woods beyond. The lamp and house lights flicker as the flames dance in the cool breeze.I created the snow fall in a few layers. The further the snow, the slower it appears to fall. This gives the scene a surprising amount of depth!Supports all screen sizes!Art by Amorphiss.

reviews.title: A little too dark...
reviews.comment: ... on my phone, and auto-panning would work better for me since my home screen doesn\'t show the tree very well. (same with pro version) However, that\'s just my phone. Still 4 stars for concept and artwork (even though I can\'t use it). I have most of Jason\'s other wallpapers and luv \'em!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads are easy to get rid of!
reviews.comment: The wallpapers by this developer are original, beautiful and great quality! Everybody is complaining about the ads but there is clearly an option in the settings where you can turn them off. I don\'t understand why everyone is having such trouble with this. He didn\'t hide them. Its right in front of your eyes. Props to the creator.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wish it worked on my Nexus 7...
